title: Serious Question: Hitler Vs. The North American Settlers
body:
You know, Hitler studied the acts of the North American Settlers from Europe to learn how to build and maintain the concentration camps that he built. 

Why is is that Hitler is seen as such a horrible person, whereas the people that you hold do dear to your heart did things that are just as bad as he did? Mass executions, torture, camps, everything imaginable.

I guess the only thing Hitler didn't do that the settlers did was give everyone crazy diseases.

Let's talk about this, because I'm genuinly curious. What makes Hitler so much worse from the settlers that you care so much about?
